Project2

Class BasicBeing

  • java.lang.Object
    • jig.Entity
      • Project2.BasicBeing

  • public class BasicBeing
extends jig.Entity
    The BasicBeing class will define all HeroTypes and MobTypes this class defines all attributes heroes and enemies. the biggest distinction between the two is controller type HeroTypes will never be controlled by AI according to spec.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicBeing

        public BasicBeing(jig.Vector position,
                  org.newdawn.slick.SpriteSheet walkingSheet,
                  org.newdawn.slick.SpriteSheet attackingSheet)
        Constructs a basic being. Initializes nextMoveCommand to idle. Then the InitAnimations(SpriteSheet, SpriteSheet) is called. The being gets initialized to the idle animation to begin with. Finally All the vectors for the next Being and map movement are initialized.
        Parameters:
        position: - A JIG Vector that set the Being starting location
        walkingSheet: - A sprite sheet of non attacking animation frames
        attackingSheet: - A sprite sheet of attack animation frames

    • Method Detail

      • CalcCurrentDisplacement

        private void CalcCurrentDisplacement()
        Calculates the BasicBeing's displacement given the current next move translation vector's x and y components. Thus the field this.currentDisplacement holds a running total of the beings displacement from their original position at game start.

      • CalcNextMoveAnimation

        private void CalcNextMoveAnimation()
        Sets the next animation dependent on the value of nextMoveCommand field. Evaluates the possible animation options based on the InputManager.InputCommands enumeration.

      • CalcNextMoveDirection

        private void CalcNextMoveDirection()
        Calculates the next move direction dependent on the current value of the nextMoveCommand field. Movement commands are defined in the InputManager class. The command is placed in a switch and evaluated accordingly. A resulting UNIT Vector is set as the next move direction vector. Thus an up command produces vector (0,1).

      • CalcNextMoveTranslation

        private void CalcNextMoveTranslation()
        Calculates the translation vector for the next move. A move translation is calculated by multiplying the Being speed by the next move direction vectors x and y components. The result is used to instantiate a new JIG Vector that is stored as nextMoveTranslation

      • CalcNextPosition

        private void CalcNextPosition()
        Calculates the Being's next position. This will be the sum of the players current position and the next move translation. These are vectors so each component must be added separately and used to create a new JIG Vector. Vector is an immutable type and must be destroyed and replaced in order to change the values.

      • GenerateNextMove

        public void GenerateNextMove(InputManager.InputCommands nextMoveCommand)
        Calculate Next Direction, Translation, and Direction Vectors. The next move command field is set from the argument passed so that the direction calculation has a next move animation is Calculated. Once the animation is set for the next move the next move direction is calculated. With move direction next move translation is calculated with the formula "translation = speed*direction". With the next translation calculated the next position can be estimated by the sum of (current position + translation). This method does not account for collisions the server will have to test being next move against everything that collides and adjusting the next translation vector accordingly.
        Parameters:
        nextMoveCommand - InputManager.InputCommands type

      • getBeingID

        public int getBeingID()
        Gets the int value of the being id
        Returns:
        the value of beingID that has been set on creation.

      • getCurrentAnimation

        public org.newdawn.slick.Animation getCurrentAnimation()
        Get the Animation currently used by the BasicBeing.
        Returns:
        Currently set Being Animation

      • getCurrentDisplacement

        public jig.Vector getCurrentDisplacement()
        The current displacement vector counts the number of "steps" the BasicBeing has taken away from their start game location. This value is used in calculating the movement of the map underneath the BasicBeing.
        Returns:
        current displacement JIG Vector

      • getCurrentDisplacementX

        public float getCurrentDisplacementX()
        Gives only the X component of current displacement Vector.
        Returns:
        current displacement vector X component

      • getCurrentDisplacementY

        public float getCurrentDisplacementY()
        Gives only the Y component of current displacement Vector.
        Returns:
        current displacement vector Y component

      • getHealth

        public float getHealth()
        Health will be a stored value in BasicBeing which all Hero and Mob types will inherit. Hit and IsDead methods will have to reference the health value to make their decisions.
        Returns:
        current float value of being health

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the String name identifier for the Being. A separate identifier in string format. This name field may serve as an identifier for clients to the server.
        Returns:

      • getNextMoveCommand

        public InputManager.InputCommands getNextMoveCommand()
        Get the last next move command the Being processed.
        Returns:
        the last next move command sent the Being.

      • getNextMoveDirection

        public jig.Vector getNextMoveDirection()
        Get the next move direction generated based on the last next move command given.
        Returns:
        currently projected direction of movement for the Being's next move.

      • getNextMoveTranslation

        public jig.Vector getNextMoveTranslation()
        Get the next move translation generated based on the last next move command given. Translation is the vector defined by the multiplication of speed and direction.
        Returns:
        currently projected speed and direction of movement for the Being's next move.

      • getNextPosition

        public jig.Vector getNextPosition()
        Get the next position projected based on the current next move translation.
        Returns:
        currently projected next position of the Being.

      • getSpeed

        public float getSpeed()
        Get the current value of the speed field. Speed is used in calculating the translation vector.
        Returns:
        current scalar speed factor used in calculating the translation vector.

      • InitAnimations

        private void InitAnimations(org.newdawn.slick.SpriteSheet walkingSheet,
                            org.newdawn.slick.SpriteSheet attackingSheet)
        Initializes the Being Animations for walking and attacking. These are set in the Basic Being Constructor.
        Parameters:
        walkingSheet -
        attackingSheet -

      • InitNextVectors

        private void InitNextVectors()
        Initializes the direction, translation, and position vectors in the basic being class.

      • IsDead

        public boolean IsDead()
        Determines if a Being is dead
        Returns:
        true if health less than or equal zero

      • IsHit

        public boolean IsHit()
        Returns the value of this.isHit which is a flag denoting the Being has encountered a collision. This method may end up deprecated soon enough as it may not have a use.
        Returns:
        the field

      • RenderBeing

        public void RenderBeing(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
        Uses the Graphics parameter passed to it to render the BasicBeing. this.render(Graphics) is a method inherited from the JIG Entity class that causes the Entity to show up on the screen.
        Parameters:
        g - Slick2d Graphic type that is passed from the client renderer.

      • setBeingID

        public void setBeingID(int beingID)
        Sets the this.beingID field with an int value.
        Parameters:
        beingID - An integer value used to identify a being object.

      • setCurrentAnimation

        public void setCurrentAnimation(org.newdawn.slick.Animation anim)
        Removes the current animation, then sets the currently playing animation to the value passed to the method.
        Parameters:
        anim - An Slick2d Animation type which gets stored in the field this.currentAnim.

        public void setCurrentDisplacementX(int newX)
        Calculates a new current displacement vector with the argument as the new X value and the current Y value.
        Parameters:
        newX - an integer value that will become the new X value of the current displacement.

      • setCurrentDisplacementY

        public void setCurrentDisplacementY(int newY)
        Creates a new current displacement vector with the current X value and newY value.
        Parameters:

      • setHealth

        public void setHealth(float health)
        Sets the current health value to the value passed to this method.

        Sets the isHit field with a boolean value.
        Parameters:

      • setNextMoveCommand

        private void setNextMoveCommand(InputManager.InputCommands nextMoveCommand)
        Sets the next move command which dictates the Being next move direction.
        Parameters:

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the BasicBeing name field to the value passed in the argument.
        Parameters:
        name - a String value that can be a player name or their IP address.

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(float speed)
        Sets the speed to the float value passed it.
        Parameters:
        speed - a float value that will be used as the magnitude of the translation vector.

      • UpdateBeingPosition

        public void UpdateBeingPosition()
        Sets the Beings Position to the currently calculated this.nextPosition; this should be called after collision checks have been made.
